Name: Catch Them If You Can
About the game: About the game This is a 3D platform control game. The gameplay is using a mind twisting method to control a spaceship to suck away the animals on the platform to complete the level task. Background You have a mission to carry animals to a zoo. However, a sleepy thought slipped into your mind later discovered all animals have escaped on the way. There is one thing, you are controlling a thing that looks like a spaceship. And you saw your green arms, that doesn't look human at all! Catch the animals! Control Left Front - LT / Right Front - RT Left Back - LB / Right Back - RB 20 Levels (EASY!) Mind twisting Control I don't think you can won level 1 in 1 minutes This is a simple game! Don't break you controller! Nothing is impossible!
